title: $:/plugins/tg/list-bullet2-button
author: TonGerner
name: 2nd level bulleted list button
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html"/> \define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) that applies 2nd level bulleted list formatting to lines containing selection.
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/list-bullet2}} You can apply 2nd level bulleted list formating to * plain text * bulleted lists
